title: High Fixed Deposits (FD) Interest Rate Upto 7.50% By This Small Finance Bank: Check Rates - Goodreturns
content: High Fixed Deposits (FD) Interest Rate Upto 7.50% By This Small Finance Bank: Check Rates  Goodreturns
description: Fixed Deposits or FDs are one of the most trusted investment tools, which are mostly chosen by senior citizens. In the last few years, alternative investments like equities and commodities have gained momentum, but FDs did not lose their importance to secure the money when markets are volatile.
